participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Energetic and creative, Emily is passionate about activities that involve movement and skill. She's a bit quirky and has a strong opinion about aesthetics.
participant_1.background: i compete in dog agility classes. i dance on the weekends. i don't care about fashion. i went to school for chemistry but work in a bookstore. i hate the color orange.

participant_2.name: Jack
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful and nurturing, Jack enjoys creating and sharing his baked goods. He has a sensitive side and tends to worry about existential matters.
participant_2.background: i've a dogs. i'm scared of dying. knitting is my passion. the county wide bake sale is where i feel most at home. i love to bake cookies.
